img_summary: The image depicts two vibrant, red, spherical objects encased in delicate, golden-veined structures, resembling exotic fruits or mystical ingredients. Based on the preceding and following text, the image likely represents an ingredient from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is part of a sequence showcasing rare and uncommon items, such as the Snake-Head Mushroom, Monkey-Head Fungus, Celestial Pear, and Tree Pearl, which are used in gameplay for crafting or progression. This particular ingredient may play a significant role in the game's narrative or mechanics, highlighting its unique design and rarity.
